segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so gross to see the water just spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, but she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how messy the whole situation is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's really rude of them to do that while the woman is busy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching for the cookie jar like it's the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like it's just so wrong for them to be doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's just as bad as her brother, encouraging him to take the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so unpleasant to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
